name: BuildaPCSales
0:
”Alexa, open computer sales”
”Alexa, open computer sales and give me today's deals”
”Alexa, open computer sales and give me today's sales”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: computer sales
des:
Welcome to the Build a PC skill! Here, you can find the latest and greatest online deals in computer parts. The deals are taken from https://reddit.com/r/buildapcsales/ subreddit. The skill will read aloud today's deals and send you a card with more information. 

To use the skill:
- invoke the skill by saying "Alexa, open computer sales"
- After the introduction message, say, "Today's deals"
- Lastly, when prompted to choose a part, you may choose any of the following parts for deals: case, cooler, fan, hdd, keyboard, mouse, ram, mobo, prebuilt, controller, cpu, gpu, headphones, monitor, psu, ssd, or meta.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
